articles.description: After calling their clash a ‘racing incident’ in the immediate aftermath, WorldSBK champion Toprak Razgatlioglu has since claimed Jonathan Rea was at fault for their race two crash in Assen.
articles.content:
Razgatlioglu, who was leading the way during race two in Assen, came under intense pressure from WorldSBK leaders Rea and Alvaro Bautista. 
After the Ducati rider failed to get through on the reigni… [+3165 chars]
